description:
Aoi, Mimimi, and Tama reminisce about the early days of their friendship and a fireworks show that provided the inspiration for Tama`s nickname.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hen na Jumon no Namae ni wa Daitai Jirarezaru Yurai ga Aru
Most Strange Spell Names Have Unknown Origins
変な呪文の名前にはだいたい知られざる由来がある
